patterns_discovered: Automatic origin header validation with CSRF protection
Flexible authentication options with multiple token types
gotchas_discovered: Origin validation is now automatically enabled when CSRF protection is on
CSRF protection is required for mutation endpoints
Different token types (jwt, mcp) have different validation requirements

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Update API route guide with origin validation

recommendations: Keep authentication documentation clear and concise
Regularly review and update security documentation
Consider adding more examples of secure API route implementations
